channel.title: Help 317 [PI]
channel.description: Hi! I used to have a server up called esscape if any of you remember it. Once it hit 100+ votes here on mopar, it was taken down due to the fact that i had a virus on my computer. I finnaly dug up the source and client but noticed that when i attempted to wield a dds, it didn't have a spec bar. Same with every other weapon. How do i fix this? Thanks <3

item.title: Help 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Moonbounddowntoearth Moonbounddowntoearth
item.description:
@Moonbounddowntoearth wrote:

Thank you for saying this. I reviewed my itemassistant.java and found the line of code that should have said said
c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7574);
said
c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7800);

Read full topic

item.title: Help 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

Moonbounddowntoearth:

Hi! I used to have a server up called esscape if any of you remember it. Once it hit 100+ votes here on mopar, it was taken down due to the fact that i had a virus on my computer. I finnaly dug up the source and client but noticed that when i attempted to wield a dds, it didn’t have a spec bar. Same with every other weapon. How do i fix this? Thanks <3

I haven’t worked on PI in a while, but if you had a 100+ vote server, shouldn’t you know this? Go to ItemAssistant.java and search for ‘public void addSpecialBar(int weapon) {’ without the quotes, and above that you should see something like

[code=java] case 14484:
case 3099:
case 3100:

		return true;
	}
	return false;[/code]

Just add case ITEMID: For ITEMID, just put the id of the item you want to have a special bar. Let me know if this works, as I am trying to refresh my memory.

Read full topic
